page.title: 20T.V.VIEWING AND OWNERSHIP.
page.content:
THE FOLLOWING CHART IS THE RESULT OF A SURVEY OF ABOUT 100 FIRST YEAR PUPILS. WE WANTED TO FIND OUT HOW OFTEN THEY WATCHED DIFFERENT TYPES OF PROGRAMMES.
OFTEN. SOMETIMES. RARELY. CARTOONS 40 30 5 DANCE 13 13 48 DOCUMENTARIES 17 13 59 FILMS 53 18 2 NATURE 20 17 45 NEWS 15 11 45 PLAYS 3 40 50 POP MUSIC 23 29 30
WE ALSO FOUND THAT MOST PUPILS HAD MORE THAN ONE T.V.IN THEIR HOMES,SOME SAID THEY HAD 4.MORE THAN HALF WERE RENTED AND ALSO COLOUR.RATHER LESS HAD REMOTE CONTROLLERS AND PORTABLE MODELS BUT OVER 75% HAD VIDEO RECORDERS ,MOST OF THESE WERE ALSO RENTED.
